DataElement.preferredName: Abnormality Other Cause Not Chronic Graft Versus Host Disease Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text description of any abnormality explained by a documented cause other than cGVHD (chronic Graft vs. Host Disease).

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Abnormality Other Etiology Negation Chronic Graft Versus Host Disease
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A condition that differs from the usual physical or mental state._Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned._The cause of a disease or abnormal condition._An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction._A syndrome of immunologically mediated tissue damage that may occur following an allogeneic transplant, and may affect multiple organs with manifestations similar to autoimmune diseases. The onset is usually within three years of transplantation or immunologic manipulation.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A condition that differs from the usual physical or mental state.

Concepts.definition: A condition that differs from the usual physical or mental state.

Property.preferredName: Other Etiology Negation Chronic Graft Versus Host Disease
Property.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.:The cause of a disease or abnormal condition.:An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.:A syndrome of immunologically mediated tissue damage that may occur following an allogeneic transplant, and may affect multiple organs with manifestations similar to autoimmune diseases. The onset is usually within three years of transplantation or immunologic manipulation.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
The cause of a disease or abnormal condition.
An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.

A syndrome of immunologically mediated tissue damage that may occur following an allogeneic transplant, and may affect multiple organs with manifestations similar to autoimmune diseases. The onset is usually within three years of transplantation or immunologic manipulation.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.
